ai-tha-ap284:1.1_0: Erāpathas I’m the one of Night
ai-tha-ap284:1.4_0: I was invited by a Buddha.
ai-tha-ap284:2.1_0: if they wanted to take it, but with rice;
ai-tha-ap284:3.2_0: and having compassion for the whole world,
ai-tha-ap284:3.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap284:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap284:4.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap284:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap284:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Dhaniya.
ai-tha-ap284:8.1_0: with the most senior monk who had become fruitless.
